definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: of burning city Jos 8:20, Jos 8:21, Ju Jdg 20:38, Jdg 20:40, cf. Na 2:14; heralding a foe Is 14:31.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in fig. of destruction of Isr. Is 9:17, Edom Is 34:10.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: sim. of dust-cloud Ct So 3:6; of transitoriness Ho 13:3, Is 51:6, Ps 37:20 (rdg. ´[[כֶּע]], as LXX SyrVer Vulgate), Ps 68:3, Ps 102:4; sim. of the unpleasant, Pr 10:26.

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: attending theoph., ´[[תַּנּוּר ע]] Ge 15:17; of mt. Ex 19:18, cf. sim. [[הַכִּבְשָׁן]] ´[[כְּע]] v:Ex 19:18; Is 6:4, also Is 4:5, Joe 3:3.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of God's anger, [[בְּאַפּוֹ]] ´[[ע]] 2Sa 22:9 = Ps 18:9; so prob. also Is 65:5.
